There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around February 27th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsCame home from night shift. Sitting in the southeast sky was an oval bright light at around 15,000 ft. It would move erratically in a small area, then settle. Looking from the northwest there are always planes coming in and out of Sky Harbor. There were no planes flying in the sky at all for a two hour time period. As the sky became lighter the globe has moved up around 30,000 feet. As of 7:15am there are no planes flying in the sky. We have seen similar objects at different times of the day and night.
Summary: Sitting in sky for hours. No planes flying as they usually do in this spot in the sky.
